Name: Sagrada
About the game: Bring your stained glass masterpiece to dazzling digital life in Sagrada, the dice-drafting board game from Floodgate Games. Take turns selecting colorful dice and placing them in your gorgeous stained-glass window. The artisan who creates the most beautiful window wins. Choose your dice carefully! Find the perfect fit for each piece of your window: restrictions on both the color and number showing on your die make for a puzzling challenge. Use your tools! As a master artisan, your tools-of-the-trade will help you shape the dice available. Please your admirers! Adapt to the fickle demands of your patrons -- while keeping your signature artistic flair -- for additional prestige.
